
                
                <p></p><div class="genxin">之前老刷杨掌柜家火锅味粉面菜蛋都说这个很辣，买了回来试一下，味道还蛮好吃的，辣度还是挺高[好运连连]…… <br><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/007C81JGgy1i0z1u7e738j30zk1bfjw0.jpg" referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/007C81JGgy1i0z1u7e738j30zk1bfjw0.jpg">
